divs: Sighting DetailsI ama over the road truck driver with my husband and I drive nights,and this day not to be exact,I was driving on and about 02:30 central time I seen something moving on the uper part of my wind shield when I looked up there was this grayish hugh metal object fling just above the streetlightscould not hear any noice but it was moving really slow it had one light yello flashing the bottom of the object waswell like you see on tv I was stund I was trying to find a place to pull over but thought what no way did I just see that I never belived in ufo'sso I got on the CB radio and asked if the fewtruck drivers that were out seen anything no answer then I saw a lot of lights flying like in a formation as the way birds fly they we white small bright lights .then a few months later I was drving I-74iL AND SEEN AREALLY BIG GLOWING GREEN LIGHT REALLY BIG CAPSULE LIKE FLING NOT STRAIGHT DOWN BUT IN A ANGAL THAT NIGHT SOMEONE ELSE DRIVING A DULEY TRUCK SAW IT ALSO WHEN I ASKED ON THE CB HE ANSWERED.I reported the 1st siting to a jasonleigh.org?greywolf1.htmhe was found when I was trying to find out where to report this he at www.uforeportingcentering.com and also reported it to Peter Davenport Director:NUFORC Back to the 1stt siting: When I first saw it I thought it was a plane but no way it was flying to low and stright it was moving very slow I thought I was seeing things but I know what I saw for sure why have I seen 3 things is this normal do people really see these more then once.I belive now but not in Aliens it has to be something but what.Then cant remember exactly but i was in Dallas,TX watching the news and there it was the same thing I saw other people sawit was right on the news same night I saw it
trends: There have been no other sightings in Groom
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: metal object sawonly the bottom/10 sec later lights were seen
